body: She learns karate but doesn't use it when she's suppose to 😂😂😂.

it's a doujin you stupid fucks

If commotion happens on the train, they have to stop the train to question the both of them. And if she's late to the cabaret job, her deal is voided and she's still in debt. Not much can be done in this situation besides getting away from them.

Wow this chick is dumb. The whole point of modern karate is for self defense. Being raped every day definitely qualifies. Even if you're not going to beat the everliving shit out of them, you could at least call for help or report them. This was so painful to read.
Sorry but I'm not into sharing
seriously is it that hard to call for help when they are not covering your mouth????
as usual, great art from crimson, but distasteful story.

There come a time when violence need to be executed, if you're being assaulted physically be it sexual or life-threatening, you have to use your violence in that one moment to save yourself from harm. SO WHY THE FUCK DIDN'T YOU DO IT YOU FUCKING RETARDED BITCH!?!!
Bleach isn't enough, I need holy water.
